title: Apparently League makes my PC rebel against me.
body:
Every time I open League, it cries with dissent. It starts not responding, and I have to try and force it to close... With the emphasis on 'try'. Task manager can't do it, not via the Applications tab nor via the Processes tab. I tried 'taskkill /im leagueclient.exe /f' in CMD - and it can't find the process.

The important thing is this: Once I open League, my computer just starts REFUSING TO COOPERATE. Any program I try to open gets immediately stuck in the best case; or refuses to open altogether in the worst case. No matter what, though, every single program leaves a "ghost process" when I attempt to open it.

This has been going on for a few days now - first only when I started a game, but now whenever I open the client. The only way to revert this is to force shutdown the computer, because the shutdown/restart button doesn't work as well. Uninstalled and reinstalled to no avail.

Has this happened to anyone else? Is there a solution to this?

replies.body:
Hmmmm it seems like your pc is really having a hard time with league for whatever reason. It might be that your pc, in general, is getting overloaded by all those 'ghost processes' you were finding. I'd suggest trying a [**clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq7) to see if that let's your computer run smoothly again.

Hit us back up if that doesn't seem to help!

BUMPing this again, the problem returned and doesn't look like it's going away... Tried the clean boot, and it helped temporarily.

Since that clean boot helped at first, it makes me think that there is something running in the background that is affecting those games like League and Overwatch. Shoot our tech guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can take a much closer look at what's going on there!

Strangely, it happened when I tried to launch Overwatch as well, so maybe it has to do with games and other "heavy" programs in general.
